mapper.insert: INSERT INTO players(playerid, teamname, playername, position, backnumber, birthdate, height, weight, joiningyear, birthplace, filename, filesize) VALUES(#{playerid}, #{teamname}, #{playername}, #{position}, #{backnumber}, #{birthdate}, #{height}, #{weight}, #{joiningyear}, #{birthplace}, #{filename}, #{filesize})
mapper.select: SELECT playerid, teamname, playername, position, backnumber, birthdate, height, weight, joiningyear, birthplace, filename, filesize FROM players WHERE teamname = #{teamname} ORDER BY backnumber
